verses.name: Hebrews 2:4
verses.text: God also bearing them witness, both with signs and wonders, and with divers miracles, and gifts of the Holy Ghost, according to his own will?

verses.name: Hebrews 2:5
verses.text: For unto the angels hath he not put in subjection the world to come, whereof we speak.

verses.name: Hebrews 2:6
verses.text: But one in a certain place testified, saying, What is man, that thou art mindful of him? or the son of man, that thou visitest him?

verses.name: Hebrews 2:7
verses.text: Thou madest him a little lower than the angels; thou crownedst him with glory and honour, and didst set him over the works of thy hands:
